message.name: ERR_RULES_UNK_ASSESSMENT_FAILED
message.locale: Run Assessment operation failed with an internal error. Please contact an administrator.

message.name: ERR_NO_ASSESSMENT_RULES_AVAILABLE_AT_CALCULATION_DATE
message.locale: No rules were present for this Assessment for the calculation date %1d.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_RULESET_RNFE_NOID
message.locale: No rules set specified for this Assessment.

message.name: INF_NO_DECISION_FOR_ASSESSMENT
message.locale: No decision has been recorded for this assessment.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTS_FV_CONCERN_ROLE_BLANK
message.locale: A concern role must be entered.
